issue.title: [C++] Add CMake option to add custom $CXXFLAGS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There seem to be some idiosyncrasies with `-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS` – my understanding is that it is better to pass in the user `$CXXFLAGS` through a different command line option
